attributes.action: ...remove this site from the Internet, as he clearly has no intention of making use of it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister's response to the recent road pricing petition that received over 1,700,000 signatures shows that he does not take this site seriously. If he can sweep such a popular petition under the carpet, why does this site even exist?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
